attributes.action: Stop the budget cut to YMCA Milton Keynes
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to give Milton Keynes council money to keep supporting the local YMCA hostel and to save it's almost uncertain future. The local council want to withdraw the £194000 a year that is given to MK YMCA to support those who are homeless to rebuild there lives. If this happens and the money is stopped then there will be NO where in Milton Keynes for the homeless to seek help and support. This government needs to stop the Local Council from doing what they propose  to do.
